name: security-compliance-marketplace
description: Professional security, privacy, and compliance auditing tools for Claude Code. Specialized marketplace featuring production-ready skills for GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA compliance, security vulnerability scanning, and defensive security analysis.

plugins.name: gdpr-auditor
plugins.description: Comprehensive GDPR compliance auditing skill that analyzes codebases, databases, and systems for EU data protection regulation compliance. Includes 8 reference documents, 5 automated scanning tools, and generates detailed compliance reports.
